typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionUniqueIdentifier as string,
		Price as string,
		DateofTransfer as string,
		Postcode as string,
		PropertyType as string,
		OldNew as string,
		Duration as string,
		PAON as string,
		SOAN as string,
		Street as string,
		Locality as string,
		TownCity as string,
		District as string,
		County as string,
		PPDCategoryType as string,
		RecordStatusMonthly as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ReadPPData
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadCompanyData
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
ReadPPData, ReadCompanyData join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
